about_the_game:
Escape to Chatter's Lake, a charming world of relaxation, where you can fish, find and care for adorable pets, express your unique style, and chill with friends in a serene lakeside setting.

The lake is full of surprises! Cast your line and feel the excitement of reeling in everything from common catches to rare fish. Every catch gets you closer to mastering the art of fishing and discovering hidden gems in the lake’s depths!

 
Chat with other players in the Chatter's Lake social lobby! Show off your latest catches, introduce your adorable pets, and compare customizations in a cozy, laid-back environment. Relax, chat, and make friends who share your love for the lake life.

Explore the lakeside and beyond to find unique pets waiting to be adopted! Bond with these charming creatures, each with its own personality and quirks. Take your new friends with you wherever you go, or show them off in the social lobby!

Express yourself with an array of outfits, accessories, and gear found in the lakeside shop. Customize your character and even your fishing equipment to make every adventure unique. Whether you’re dressing up or dressing down, Chatter's Lake has something for every style!

Stroll around the lake, uncover secret spots, complete fun challenges from local animal residents, and earn rewards that enrich your experience. With seasonal events and new items arriving regularly, Chatter's Lake is the perfect escape that grows and evolves with you.

Take a break from the everyday hustle and dive into the quiet, calming world of Chatter's Lake. Cast a line, meet new friends, and make memories by the lake.

Escape to Chatter's Lake, a charming world of relaxation, where you can fish, find and care for adorable pets, express your unique style, and chill with friends in a serene lakeside setting.

The lake is full of surprises! Cast your line and feel the excitement of reeling in everything from common catches to rare fish. Every catch gets you closer to mastering the art of fishing and discovering hidden gems in the lake’s depths!

 
Chat with other players in the Chatter's Lake social lobby! Show off your latest catches, introduce your adorable pets, and compare customizations in a cozy, laid-back environment. Relax, chat, and make friends who share your love for the lake life.

Explore the lakeside and beyond to find unique pets waiting to be adopted! Bond with these charming creatures, each with its own personality and quirks. Take your new friends with you wherever you go, or show them off in the social lobby!

Express yourself with an array of outfits, accessories, and gear found in the lakeside shop. Customize your character and even your fishing equipment to make every adventure unique. Whether you’re dressing up or dressing down, Chatter's Lake has something for every style!

Stroll around the lake, uncover secret spots, complete fun challenges from local animal residents, and earn rewards that enrich your experience. With seasonal events and new items arriving regularly, Chatter's Lake is the perfect escape that grows and evolves with you.

Take a break from the everyday hustle and dive into the quiet, calming world of Chatter's Lake. Cast a line, meet new friends, and make memories by the lake.
name: Chatters Lake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700E Or AMD Ryzen 5 3500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700E Or AMD Ryzen 7 4800U
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060

short_description: Welcome to *Chatter's Lake*! Fish, find lovable pets, and customize your look in this cozy lakeside world. Show off your catches, pets, and style in the social lobby as you relax and connect with others. Discover the joy of lakeside life, your way, in *Chatter's Lake*!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support
